newsitem.title: USA: Tandem unveils servers, security initiative.
newsitem.headline: Tandem unveils servers, security initiative.

text.p: Tandem Computers Inc said Wednesday it introduced two families of computer servers, including a line designed around Microsoft Corp's Windows NT operating system.
Tandem's second family is designed around Tandem's Himalaya architecture, running the UNIX operating system.

The company also unveiled a major strategic initiative, based on these two server families, to create a secure environment for electronic commerce on public networks such as the Internet. Tandem said all its new servers are available either immediately or by the summer of 1997.
Pricing of the new servers was not immediately available.
